item.description: Profile My experience is varied however I have found myself enjoying challenging tasks, whether it be maintaining the balance between the customer-business relationship or following specific criteria to design and create real world solutions to problems. I believe if I run into a problem, I can find a way to work through it in the most efficient and productive way. Expertise and software experience I’ve been working as a L1/L2 Technical Support and Server Administrator for 18 months.

About me Hi there, My name is Cam. Here’s a stream of consciousness and a little about what lead me to IT. I spent a lot of time doing very hard manual labour in some pretty average places, the best being a stint in a heat treatment plant. I was tasked, with my friend Tomas, to restore an old steel quenching furnace. This is the process of cooking steel at 900 degrees, and then dropping it into hot oil.
